title: Drive Medical 460900403 Bellavita Bath Lift Charger
features: Charger for Bath Lift: Replacement charger for Bellavita Bath Lift; charges the battery in hand control; operates on AC power
How to Use: To charge the hand control device, disconnect from the bath lift chair and keep it dry
Made For: Bellavita bath chair lift
Dimensions: 3.15 inches in length x 1.77 inches in width x 2.27 inches in height
description: Drive Medical's Charger for Bath Lift Chairs by Bellavita replaces your old or worn-out chargers. It operates on AC power and charges the batteries in your hand control with ease. We are the innovative manufacturers of mobility, pressure prevention, respiratory, bath accessories and bath safety products that help you live a full and active life.
